name: Yamide Tiles - Legend Piano 3
description:
Let’s play Yamide Tiles - Legend Piano 3 – one of the top games 2020 with more feature and mini game NOW! FOR FREE!

Tap on the black tiles,blue tiles, avoid tap on traps while listening to music.
Hurry now! Enjoy classical and pop music, challenge your friends, improve your tapping speed!.
Compete with your friends and speed up your fingers!
Download now and play the high speed rhythm challenge to various songs!
